description: This file implements a gRPC client class (TokenClient) for interacting with OttTokenService, providing methods to obtain platform and authentication tokens, managing gRPC channel creation, context setup, and request handling.

classes.name: TokenClient
classes.description: A client for interacting with the OttTokenService gRPC service, providing methods to retrieve platform and auth tokens with configurable channels and deadlines.

methods.name: void ApplyDeadline(grpc::ClientContext & ctx,const uint32_t grpcTimeoutMs)
methods.description: Sets a deadline on the gRPC client context based on the provided timeout in milliseconds.

methods.name: std::shared_ptr<grpc::Channel> CreateChannel(const std::string & endpoint,const bool useTls,const uint32_t idleTimeoutMs)
methods.description: Creates and returns a gRPC channel to the specified endpoint with optional TLS and idle timeout settings.

methods.name: bool GetPlatformToken(const std::string & appId,const std::string & xact,const std::string & sat,std::string & outToken,uint32_t & outExpiresIn,std::string & errMsg)
methods.description: Retrieves a platform token from the server using specified parameters, handling gRPC communication and error conditions.

methods.name: bool GetAuthToken(const std::string & appId,const std::string & sat,const std::string & partnerId,const std::string & sct,std::string & outToken,uint32_t & outExpiresIn,std::string & errMsg)
methods.description: Retrieves an authentication token from the server with specified parameters, handling gRPC communication and errors.

methods.name: TokenClient(const std::string & endpoint,const bool useTls,const uint32_t grpcTimeoutMs,const uint32_t idleTimeoutMs)

ctags.name: CreateChannel
ctags.signature: (const std::string & endpoint,const bool useTls,const uint32_t idleTimeoutMs)

ctags.name: GetAuthToken
ctags.signature: (const std::string & appId,const std::string & sat,const std::string & partnerId,const std::string & sct,std::string & outToken,uint32_t & outExpiresIn,std::string & errMsg)

ctags.signature: (const std::string & appId,const std::string & xact,const std::string & sat,std::string & outToken,uint32_t & outExpiresIn,std::string & errMsg)
